message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,400,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase the product. I am willing to pay $1,350,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer.  I'm confident this product provides significant value at $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,380,000.
I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for considering my previous offer. I am still interested in purchasing the product, and I am willing to pay $1,360,000 for it.
